thread.section_title: Pod 39 Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pleasantly surprised
thread.title_full: Pleasantly surprised - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 2016corrie
title: Pleasantly surprised
text: Recently a friend and I decided to take a long weekend trip in New York. We didn't want to spend a whole lot on accommodations so we combed the web looking for reasonably priced hotels. We found Pod 31. The price was right as we only needed a clean, safe room. We booked the room with a bunk bed and private bath. Yes, bunk bed. Each bed had it's own T.V. The room was small with not much room but it was all we needed. It was a wonderful stay with great service, nothing fancy but if all you want is a safe, reasonably priced stay then try Pod 39. It's on 39th Street as it's name implies, with great shopping not far away. We were pleasantly surprised and would stay there again.
